TopicTitle: Destoy the space center in ksp 1.8

Articles.Content:
Good luck you'll need it.

No object thrower.

Wow they really increased the durability on the buildings. Not only did a pair of >3-tonne bombs at 250 m/s have no effect on telescopes with a direct hit, but I clipped the bomber's wings on a flag and THAT had no effect either.

A couple of max-sized S4 tanks and 8 Clydesdales can blow up the VAB  fairly reliably, but a single Clydesdale cannot, although it can destroy the Astronaut Complex. A Stearwing A300 with former vice president Cheney at the wheel did nothing to the VAB at 250 m/s.

Edited October 24, 2019 by Pds314
Nope.... 50 tonne Pollux SRB inside an A300 won't do it either.
Clydesdale missle attack fail:

It might be something to do with where you hit? Or total area of impact?

After failing a few times with an SRB missile launched from the launchpad and hitting end on (perpendicular to VAB walls), I changed something and the SRB clipped the ground in front of the VAB causing it to flip up and randomly land on the VAB walls, parallel to the walls. The VAB exploded and collapsed. But the strange thing was that the SRB continued without a problem (maybe some of its fins were destroyed) and just flew up into the air until it ran out of juice. It was weird.
